website_summaries.verdict: The durability of this watch combined with convenient features and sleek aesthetic make it an impressive choice for everyday wear.
pros: Made of durable materials to withstand everyday wear
Has 3 convenient sub-dials on face: 24-hour clock, 30-minute timer, and 60-second timer
Has useful feature of being water resistant
cons: Although water-resistant, watch should not be taken swimming

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: First watch sent: strap doesn’t stay in place, the watch keeps falling off my wrist. Ordered a replacement. Second watch is the wrong model/ style AND is used!!!! Strap came in soiled with sweat and dirt. A total scam.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Durrell

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Nice box and add campaign though.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice presentation and packaging but the watch is not well built and it looks and feels cheap, especially up close. Granted it was inexpensive but there are better value options at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It is a great looking product but the quality will fail. I have worn 3-4 times a week for 3 months and the seconds hand fell off floating around inside the watch. Amazon says my return window is closed. Again don’t buy if you want it to last
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lyman

customer_reviews.title: This review prompted by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the watch for 2 days and it seems great so far, but, honestly, it's far too early for an honest and accurate review. However, if I don't review it now Amazon will continue to send me email prompts to rate my purchase. I find this very annoying, so I'll get it over with now at the expense of an accurate review. The watch appears as advertised (although the band is slightly lighter in color than the photos show) and nothing to complain about yet. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: Fake watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a $150 Mvmt watch and they sent me a knockoff starking watch in a mvmt box. It looks like it except very poor quality. Really disappointed. Order through the mvmt website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, however, it is difficult to see at night. I like the watch enough otherwise that my complaint doesn’t detract from my opinion of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Carnline

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to dress up for dress down. Comfortable watch with a bigger face, but not too big for an average wrist. Stylish watch, but has two downfalls. 1) The face is quite dark and does not light up, so it can be hard to read at night and 2) the adjustable loop for the strap tends to slide around leaving the slack of the band to hang. Side note, I think the two buttons north and south of the crown are just for show. They push, but do not do anything to my knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: adam jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second watch from MVMT. I really like the 45mm face on this one. My Airedale terrier has a black saddle on his tan body, like this watch. I call this my 'Airedale Chrono Watch'.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Classy, but a Bit Steep . . .
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch. It's classy, simple and brings everything else together. I wear it almost every day. However, there are a few nagging annoyances. There's a bit of play almost everywhere. The straps don't grab the lugs tightly. The second hand on the stopwatch rests off it's axis. It doesn't have a very solid feel. I'm still glad I bought it, but for $94, I would've expected more. I would still recommend it, but not with much fervor.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty and stylish watch, however, the hands are almost completely invisible in daylight and of course totally invisible at night as they do not glow in any way and there is no illumination. The inner "minimalist chronograph" hands are very easy to see at a glance. However, I was literally having to hold the watch up to my face and study it for a few seconds to figure out where the hour and minute hands were to check the time. It just became too annoying having that much trouble reading the time from the watch and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I already wrote a review for this watch but I was prompted again. I love this watch. I have more expensive watches but this one may be my favorite. I was a little concerned about the crystal material because MVMT doesn't really say what it is but it is as hard as sapphire. I will be buying more of the MVMT watches. I get complaints on this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I paid $150 for my watch, but it looks and feels like a $20 watch, feels cheap, very disappointed, like the design but it is definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and gave it to him on our wedding day. Great quality and even more beautiful in person! Very sharp! The black is more on the flat side; not very shiny—and the rose gold looks amazing with it! The watch arrived in a nice black and red MVMT branded box. My husband wasn’t much of a “watch guy,” but MVMT has changed that. We will be purchasing more styles in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent + Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Noice!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is simple....yet sophisticated. For real though the watch face catches the eye. The band seems ok. It’ll probably fail in the future, but the watch is a nice piece to have and I enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger TS

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing and MVMT for a bit, and I wound up purchasing the watch because I have recently come into possession of some gold/onyx Tiffany cufflinks that belonged to my grandfather, and had no watch that really worked with them. This was an inexpensive way to look expensive. I don't plan on wearing it too often, but i did try it on and it is a nice piece, as described. Band is a soft leather that I imagine with time will mold itself to my wrist. Love the 45mm size too. Will likely get another MVMT for more regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Gave this watch to my fiancé for Christmas. He loved the style, but after 4 months the minute hand BROKE. It no longer moves and just flops around inside the watch face. So unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: First time watch buyer, LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard of MVMT from the Ben Shapiro show-- loved their story. I've never been much of a watch guy but as a young professional I've noticed all the guys in senior and executive leadership wear watches, so I thought I'd buy a MVMT watch for an upcoming business trip. I am beyond pleased with the look, style, quality, and comfort of the watch. I love the wrist band, it's not your typical metal band. Modern, sleek, cool, stylish. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this would easily be a 5 star review, but as other reviews on MVMT's website and on Amazon have stated, the blue is no where near as vibrant as what it appears in the pictures. The blue pops out in the pictures and and there is no mistaking it for blue. Now, the actual watch I received looks more like a dark grey with a blueish tint. It sucks because the watch still looks fantastic, but it isn't what I wanted. I had bought a previous watch from MVMT that was exactly as advertised, so maybe this may be just this one particular watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Simple but elegant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband, for Christmas, I must say it was the perfect gift. He wanted an all-black elegant watch with multi-use, this watch is it.
customer_reviews.author: Shakita Fultz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Lightweight. Have only worn a few times so i dont know about longevity but feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: NATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Got it in Time - Very Elegant Watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the watch, it's quite elegant and we already ordered another band for it. It appears well made and durable. Highly recommend for those who prefer to steer clear of the iwatch and retain originality. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply designed but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is the third watch I've ordered from MVMT. They are beautifully designed in a simple fashionable way. I've received nothing but good compliments since adding them to my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: A fine looking timepiece
customer_reviews.text: If you can ignore the 1" vertical crack on the face of the watch. Why does trash like this make it past Q&A? It is obviously damaged - are you hoping consumers are too lazy to return things. I'm so tired of receiving faulty and damaged goods when purchasing here - like you are trying to screw over the consumer. If the replacement is 100000000% up to my standards I may add a star to this review.
customer_reviews.author: modosto

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep time well
customer_reviews.text: A watch is for one thing. Tell time. I value a watch that keeps perfect time. This watch does not do that. The Chinese watch Burei does and for less money. Hum.....
customer_reviews.author: desmond

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves this watch. He is wearing it every time I see him. 4 stars because he wishes it had a light. He can’t see the time at night haha
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lee Flemister

customer_reviews.title: Was not impressed with the build quality.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the watch it look very cool my issue is the other buttons don't seem to do anything. They seem like the buttons are just there to be buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chrono watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch in order to have a good looking watch for a portrait session I was having with my wife. It looks sharp! Since that photo session I have decided to wear it every day. It's well made, easy to operate, and I think one of my favorite things is the fact that the watch band has a little lever on each part of the band for extremely easy swapping of straps. great design!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Morris Photography

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my brother for Christmas. He hasn't stopped wearing it. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: What I like best is that this watch is light weight, and stylish. I can wear it daily, with jeans, and then dress-up and look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: valerye kym moore

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, can be worn as a casual or formal watch. Im planning on adding more MVMT watches to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: 808Aloha

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. The ability to change out the bands quickly is really cool. The only issue I have with this watch is that the dials dig into my hand and they're kind of sharp. Other then that it's an awesome watch
customer_reviews.author: matthew vachon

customer_reviews.title: I got Wife points for this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 or 5 of these for my husband and he really loves them. Says they fit great and that he gets compliments frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Ford

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: a year+ in, have gotten a bunch of complements. Looks professional .
customer_reviews.author: Jonoe

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the shade of blue as in the picture, but still very nice
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is good, as the title says, the blue is a tad bit closer to a sky blue but its still a very good looking watch. Keeps time well, pretty impressive for the price
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our sons high school graduation, when it arrived by my wife and i were disappointed, was so small and looked like a woman's watch on our sons wrist. Also, thought it was black, not the case, very light.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the watch for our 16 year old grandson and he absolutely loves it. Ordering process was simple and the included coupon even made the watch a bigger value.
customer_reviews.author: Harry T Scott

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice watch to pair with my suits. This was the perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very stylisj
customer_reviews.text: Loved the box it came in for gifting, very elegant. The watch is a nice dark black and overall super sleek. My boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Chaplick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super slick design, love the pop of the blue. Loads of compliments walking by people. Would be nice if it had backlight of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look keeps good time. Not a Rolex but don’t claim to be.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand All these people bashing MVMT. I love my watch and get a lot of complaints. They don’t claim to be Rolex or some Swiss 100 year old company. It’s a style for people not wanting to spend tons of money. It’s not a watch for the watch collectors.
customer_reviews.author: D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: mvmt does a great job. My friends and I are all fans. Great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Giard

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. Says it fits good and the face is great.
customer_reviews.author: Love For Books

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this watch. My man loves it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Quality weight to it. Proper classy. A must have for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this watch. I've owned a few different MVMT watches and I like all of them. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch to wear on my wedding last February and wear it frequently still. It’s a beautiful watch and has held up great so far. The face still looks beautiful and the leather has patinaed very well. For a watch around $100 it is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the package and put it on. Seems very nice and well built. I love the black/silver color. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looking watch. Although not as functional as other watches today, this watch is on the top list for aesthetics. Get it for the looks, not the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf435

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This is a christmas gift and it's wrapped very elegantly, expensive looking, very impressive. Delivery was fast and I can't wait until my daughter's boyfriend opens it on Christmas eve.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this watch and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 boys

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch / a little pricey but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our realestate agent. He loved it !!
customer_reviews.author: William Murray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking watch. Comfortable. Everything I thought it was gonna be and more. Only thing was I thought the watch was going to be bigger but it’s still a good size and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as blue
customer_reviews.text: The watch is a bit bigger than I imagined. I’m disappointed because the blue watch face isn’t as blue in real life. I bought it because I wanted a blue face. It’s more dark gray with blue iridescence. Overall, it still looks good but it’s not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing
customer_reviews.text: I like everything but that you cant see it at night. It was used as a wrist watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sally O Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch feels and looks so cheap its has the quality of walmart watchs with much higher price tag don't buy waste of money I returned the watch
customer_reviews.author: Rami f.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend & he loves it! Great quality and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to shop for
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly... for my grandson at Stanford.... haven’t given to him yet
customer_reviews.author: susan r daniels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch so far. Clean, crisp and well worth the money. Had never purchased an MVMT watch before - I was worried about the quality. Has a very rich and solid feel to it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sigel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Minimalist Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, it's beautiful. The time setting knob seems sharper than necessary and causes some irritation where my hand bends, but I just tighten the band and wear it a little higher on my wrist. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. King

customer_reviews.title: The looks are fantasti!
customer_reviews.text: Really a beautiful time piece! Quote classy looking! One issue i do have is how to adjust the bank. Quite confusing since you don't want to force anything and break something. I'd do a conventional band of i had known.
customer_reviews.author: James Haviley

customer_reviews.title: great looking watch at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of the watch very solid, good size. The one thing I wish it had, was the hands for the hours and minutes had some sort of glow on the dark or a light is very hard to tell time in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: efren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I get plenty of compliments and guess what, it keeps the time..
customer_reviews.author: Nitro

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my husband and although the box was a bit beat up, the watch did not seem damaged and he really liked this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Haven’t worn it much so not sure about durability, but it’s an eye catcher for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: He loved it. Gorgeous! Although it did take a while to set the date lol
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. I like the appearance of how it is two tone. And it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Watch
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, Amazon screwed me out of $30 because I bought in on prime day and then the delivery couldn't be made because they used the USPS, watch is nice though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new watch. Looks good in person as well as in the photo. Light weight. Not too heavy on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Twila Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Even Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! At first I was skeptical of the strap quality from the pictures. I hear MVMT made good watches so decided to get it and the strap is great!!! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, unveiling, real leather wristband good qaulity all around not cheaply made very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Kyle k.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend absolutely loved this watch. Very stylish and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!...if you use it during the day...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! The only issues is that the pinters are not reflectant on the nigth, so is almost impossible to view the time under poor or no ligth.
customer_reviews.author: wycleaf

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the vincero face better than the MVMT chronograph but this watch looks slick. Great purchase. The band is also perfect for sports activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a fathers day gift and i was not disappointed. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice watch, thought the leather strap was a little nicer then it turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Demyan

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a birthday gift for my dayghters boyfriends and so far he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for sunny weather
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Looks amazing with NATO straps and the white face is great for summer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Sexy watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband for anniversary he absolutely loves it. It looks sexy on him!
customer_reviews.author: Stylin_Hawaiian_89

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My partner truly enjoyed the style & functionality of the watch! Perfect addition birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Not worth it. You can do a lot better for a lot less. Doesn’t look as good in person as in the photos in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watches, especially for the price! This was my third purchase of a MVMT and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: damaged product, stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: The watch stopped working after one month! Unable to return the product at this point, very disappointing. Do not recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sutormina Margarita

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new watch!! Style and craftsmanship are outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ BLUE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he is in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, fit and style arrived as expected. Makes an awesome gift for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: Hope it lasts years.
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift, a little worried, it didn’t seem very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing watch! The package was perfectly packed. I will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and great looking watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant. Bought it as a gift for my picky husband and he liked it :)
customer_reviews.author: Sogra Nishath

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful  watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my son. He loves it!!! Great watch at a great price! May get him another in a different style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and looked exactly as described. Hubby loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Anah Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Good look
customer_reviews.text: I use the product for business dress and casual outings.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch
customer_reviews.text: It looks great for the price. I'll probably buy from them again soon
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: On time shipping and my watch is so beautiful It’s nothing happen with watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MVMT Men's Chronograph Watch with Analog Date
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.8 x 3.6 x 1.6 inches; 9.12 Ounces
 * Item model number :Chrono
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :June 11, 2015
 * Manufacturer :MVMT
 * ASIN :B00WZ6B1MS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #81,091 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #400 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #20675 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars505 ratings
feature_bullets: This chronograph features a 45MM case that's 12MM thick; the watch has a main dial and three subdials: one for a 24-hour clock, a 30-minute timer, and a 60-second timer; movement is battery-powered 6-hand chronograph with date
Black strap crafted from 100% genuine leather; the strap is easily interchangeable should you desire a different feel or style

The case of this chronograph is pitch black and constructed from brushed stainless steel; the glass is made from hardened mineral crystal for enhanced durability; gunmetal hands and markers are set against a black dial
MVMT Chrono is durable and water resistant; it's weatherproof up to 5 ATM/50 Meters, and it can withstand brief submersion in water; it should not, however, be taken swimming or bathing
Designed in the USA at MVMT's headquarters in Los Angeles, CA; we're confident you'll love our watches, so we offer a two-year guarantee for everything we make
